subject: Football
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Seven former N.F.L. players accused the league and the lawyers representing 4,500 retirees of failing to justify how they reached their proposed settlement, which includes uncapped damages for players with severe neurological disorders.
snippet: Seven former N.F.L. players accused the league and the lawyers representing 4,500 retirees of failing to justify how they reached their proposed settlement, which includes uncapped damages for players with severe neurological disorders.
